ItemTooltips.branches: Extra stats and builds into Magic Wand
ItemTooltips.boots: Standard buy. Astral shares your movement speed which is why buying boots at the start of the game is mandatory.
ItemTooltips.magic_stick: Stores for extra hp/mana. Always great to help stay in the lane. Very good against Batrider.
ItemTooltips.clarity: Helps keep your mana up with the Astrals you are throwing out.
ItemTooltips.bottle:
6.79 - costs 50 gold more

Standard for mid lane. Helps lash out Astral spam too.
ItemTooltips.tango: Starting regen to help in lane till you have bottle. Due to 6.79 changes you cannot be pooled a set of tangoes but you can be given 1.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Treads are your standard boots. Other viable boots are arcanes (if building meka) or phase.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Very strong for fights and pushes, two things TC does very good at. Gives an extra +2 armour when used.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: A very strong item that gives you decent stats and regen. Due to it's high cost, you will largely get the gold not from farming, but from kills.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: A defensive item that is great for getting right in the middle of everyone or getting a teammate out.
ItemTooltips.assault: AC gives TC his tankiness and even stacks with Natural Order for extra minus armour. This makes it a deadly combination against high armour heroes.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Because you will get most of your damage through your spirit, expect teams to attempt at crowd controlling TC. A BKB well help you land a Stomp, Earth Splitter and just whack everyone like a truck.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Slow slow slow. Shiva's helps keeps the enemy team in your natural order. An alternative to AC as both items give TC his tankiness.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: The best item for little gold you can buy. It will help spamming Astrals right on top of the enemy supports, jungle camps and lane creeps.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Drums is a cost efficient early item that synergises well with TC. The passive stats helps out A LOT for himself and the team.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Heavens Halberd is a very strong item with decent stats on TC due to him being a STR hero. It will come in handy when you can disarm an enemy carry in a fight.

AbilityTooltips.elder_titan_echo_stomp: Echo Stomp requires help to set it up correctly. Level 2 Stomp will successfully land an Earth Splitter. If you stomp an enemy underneath your tower, the tower attacks will not wake them up allowing you to either stop a push or get an easy kill. The Spirit deals magical damage whilst TC is Physical.
AbilityTooltips.elder_titan_ancestral_spirit: This is the abilty that will make you scary if used correctly. Make sure you hit and chase enemy heroes + creeps. Your spirit also has Natural Order meaning you do not need to always be infront of everyone. Besides for harrassment, it's very strong to use for scouting.
AbilityTooltips.elder_titan_natural_order: Arguably your strongest ability next to Astral Spirit. Reducing the base armour and magic resist from the enemy is a huge deal.
AbilityTooltips.elder_titan_earth_splitter: Like your Stomp, Earth Splitter requires a setup to hit. 50% of the damage is physical whilst the other 50% is magical. A very huge hit against STR based heroes and those with a Heart of Tarrassque.
